mapper.insert: insert into User_B (UserID, UserName, Gender, PassWord, DepartmentID, Job, Phone, Telephone, Role, IsShow, LeaderID, IsOnline, HomeControl) values (#{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{departmentID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{leaderID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isOnline,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{homeControl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update User_B set UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PassWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DepartmentID = #{departmentID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Job = #{job,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Role = #{role,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, IsShow = #{isShow,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LeaderID = #{leaderID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, IsOnline = #{isOnline,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, HomeControl = #{homeControl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UserID, UserName, Gender, PassWord, DepartmentID, Job, Phone, Telephone, Role, IsShow, LeaderID, IsOnline, HomeControl from User_B where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
